faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly. We're happy to help.

items.question: How do I choose the right solution?
items.answer: We recommend contacting us first. Once we understand your needs and target scenarios, we'll provide the most suitable solution recommendations. Each solution can be customized to your requirements.

items.question: What hardware equipment is needed?
items.answer: It depends on the solution. VR/MR solutions require VR headsets and related hardware; AR solutions can use smartphones or tablets; smart spaces require IoT sensors; AI solutions are primarily software services.

items.question: What is the approximate implementation cost?
items.answer: Costs depend on project scale and complexity. PoC validation stages are typically lower, while full project development depends on requirements. Please contact us for detailed pricing.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive maintenance services including system monitoring, troubleshooting, version updates, and performance optimization. Maintenance plans can be selected based on your needs.

cta.headline: Ready to Launch? Whether it's VR training, AR guidance, smart spaces, or AI applications, we can create deployable solutions for you.

process.title: End-to-End Service from Concept to Launch

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: Understanding your business goals and scenario requirements, assessing technical feasibility.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: Providing customized technical architecture, hardware specifications, and execution plans.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Software/Hardware integration, interactive content development, and interface design.

steps.title: Deployment
steps.description: On-site installation, debugging, stress testing, and personnel training.

steps.title: Maintenance
steps.description: Ongoing technical support, system maintenance, and performance optimization.

comparison.title: Compare Four Solutions Quickly
comparison.description: Use timeline, budget and complexity to shortlist first, then refine scope with our team.

faq.title: Solutions FAQ
faq.description: Common questions around selection and implementation phases.

items.question: Which solution should we start with first?
items.answer: Start with a scoped and measurable scenario such as AR visualization or an AI knowledge assistant, then scale to IoT or XR in phases.

items.question: Can we combine multiple solutions in one roadmap?
items.answer: Yes. We define a phase-one MVP first, then split technical milestones to reduce risk and improve rollout speed.

items.question: Do you provide maintenance and optimization after launch?
items.answer: Yes. We provide options for monthly maintenance, version upgrades, and monitoring services based on your needs.

metadata.title: Technology Core | XR (VR/AR/MR) Device Integration × AI × 5G/6G × Multi-sensory Interaction
metadata.description: Built on XR foundation, integrating haptics, omnidirectional treadmills, AI, and high-speed networks to create deployable immersive interactive systems.

hero.headline: Creating Deployable Immersive Interactive Experiences
hero.subheadline: With OASIS as our vision, integrating XR devices, AI big data, 5G/6G networks, and multi-sensory technologies to create real value for your business.

cta.headline: Want to learn more technical details? Our technical team can provide more in-depth technical consultation and solution recommendations.

flow.title: System Integration Flow
flow.description: Each step maps to a concrete delivery output for controllable implementation.

steps.title: Data Sources
steps.description: Collect inputs from sensors, internal systems, and third-party APIs.

steps.title: API Integration
steps.description: Define service contracts and interfaces for stable cross-system integration.

steps.title: Backend Processing
steps.description: Run business rules, AI inference, and data governance pipelines.

steps.title: Frontend Rendering
steps.description: Map service outputs into web and XR interfaces with clear information hierarchy.

steps.title: Device Delivery
steps.description: Deploy to on-site devices and control endpoints for real-world operation.

architecture.title: Layered Design from Data to Experience
architecture.description: We connect data, intelligence, and delivery endpoints with modular architecture for scalable operations.

layers.title: Data & Device Layer
layers.description: Unifies sensor streams, external APIs, and enterprise systems into consistent input contracts.

layers.title: Service & Intelligence Layer
layers.description: Processes data, orchestration rules, and AI inference through backend service modules.

layers.title: Experience Layer
layers.description: Delivers outputs to web apps, XR devices, and on-site interfaces for deployable interactions.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Pencil Spatial Dynamics
metadata.description: Privacy Policy for Pencil Spatial Dynamics.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.lead: Your privacy is critically important to us. Included below are our policies for handling your data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect necessary information to provide better services. This may include:
items: Project requirements and usage scenario descriptions
Technical data when browsing the website (IP address, browser type)

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Collected data is only used for:
items: Responding to your inquiries and providing quotes
Providing, maintaining, and improving our services
Sending service updates or technical notifications

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use Cookies to improve your browsing experience. These Cookies are used to remember your preferences and analyze website traffic. You can refuse Cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect the use of some functions.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: To provide complete solutions, we may use third-party services (such as Google Analytics for traffic analysis). These services have their own privacy policies, which we recommend you review.

security.title: Security
security.content: We employ industry-standard security measures (such as SSL encryption) to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, internet transmission is never 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: User Rights
rights.content: In accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act, you have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us.

privacy.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us at:

metadata.title: Terms of Service | Pencil Spatial Dynamics
metadata.description: Terms of Service for Pencil Spatial Dynamics.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.lead: Welcome to Pencil Spatial Dynamics. by using our website and services, you agree to the following terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By visiting this website or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Scope of Services
services.content: Pencil Spatial Dynamics provides XR (VR/AR/MR), AI Artificial Intelligence, and Smart Space solutions. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate parts of the service at any time without prior notice.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: When using this service, users shall comply with relevant laws and regulations of the Republic of China and shall not engage in the following behaviors:
items: Using this service for any illegal or unauthorized activities
Interfering with or disrupting the system security or integrity of this service
Collecting or using other users' personal data without authorization

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: This website and its content (including but not limited to text, images, software code, trademarks) are owned by Pencil Spatial Dynamics or its licensors and are protected by copyright laws and other intellectual property laws. Unauthorized reproduction, modification, or reprinting without written permission is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This service is provided on an "as is" basis without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free. Pencil Spatial Dynamics shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of this service.

jurisdiction.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: The interpretation and application of these terms, as well as disputes related to these terms, shall be handled in accordance with the laws of the Republic of China, and the Kaohsiung District Court in Taiwan shall be the court of first instance.

terms.contact: If you have any questions regarding these terms, please contact:
